title: Apple to Sell Debt to Help Fund $300 Billion Capital Return
content: Apple Inc. is selling bonds as the iPhone maker looks to fund stock buybacks and dividends.

title: Apple CEO Cook breathes new life into old iPhones
content: Apple CEO Tim Cook put to rest concerns that the company's flagship device, the iPhone X, wouldn't be ready in time for the holiday shopping season.

title: The Times of India Strong tech earnings, Apple lift Nasdaq higher - Times of India
content: USA-STOCKS :Strong tech earnings, Apple lift Nasdaq higher

title: Apple's iPhone X to bring company a very merry holiday
content: Apple's results and forecast also suggest iPhone 8 sales weren't as bad as expected.
